alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County; Marfa Plateau; Pecos; Presidio Valley; Terrell; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued February 14 at 2:11PM CST until February 16 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR VERY HIGH TO EXTREME FIRE DANGER ALONG WITH VERY WINDY, AND DRY CONDITIONS FOR MOST OF THE TRANS PECOS... The National Weather Service in Midland/Odessa has issued a Fire Weather Watch which is in effect from Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Ward, Pecos, Terrell, Marfa Plateau, Central Brewster County, Chisos Basin, Presidio Valley and Lower Brewster County. * TIMING...Wednesday morning through Wednesday evening. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 35 mph, gusts 40 to 50 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * RFTI...6 or critical.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur.

area.areaDesc: Central Brewster County; Chisos Basin; Lower Brewster County; Marfa Plateau; Pecos; Presidio Valley; Terrell; Ward
